description: This Garlic Cheese Bread is SO easy to make and tastes just like you would get from your favorite pizza place!
name: The Easiest Garlic Cheese Bread
recipeIngredient: 1-2 teaspoons dried Italian herbs, I like herbs de Provence

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat oven to 450 degrees F. Add the flour and yogurt to a medium sized bowl and mix until a dough is formed. You will probably have to use your hands to get it all mixed together. Line a large sheet pan with a non-stick mat or parchment paper and lightly grease. Use your hands to press out the dough. you want it to be about 1/4 inch thick.

Evenly spread the butter over the dough and then sprinkle with 1/2 -1 teaspoons both granulated garlic and dried herbs. Top with cheese and then sprinkle again with garlic and dried herbs. If desired, sprinkle a little kosher salt on top.
Bake cheese bread until beginning to brown and cheese is bubbly, about 15 minutes. Let cool for a few minutes, cut into rectangles and serve with marinara or ranch.

video.description: These super easy Garlic Cheese Bread recipe is made with just a few ingredients and it takes no time at all!
video.name: Easy Garlic Cheese Bread
